news.title: Silver hit record highs in 2025 – here's why the 'Devil’s metal' has further to run
news.summary: Industrial demand for silver is expected to decline slightly in 2025. Silver is increasingly used in electric vehicles, for AI components and in photovoltaics.

news.title: China factory activity edges up but remains in contraction as fading holiday demand hits services
news.summary: The National Bureau of Statistics said the manufacturing purchasing managers index rose to 49.2. The index was up 0.2 points from October and in line with forecasts in a Reuters poll.

news.title: American Airlines says all planes impacted by Airbus glitch have been fixed
news.summary: American Airlines says aircrafts impacted by Airbus recall have received software fixes. American Airlines: Aircrafts impacted have received the software fixes necessary to resume flying.

news.title: Student loans and year-end tax planning — 4 steps for borrowers to take
news.summary: Recent changes to the federal student loan system may affect borrowers' taxes. There are some helpful steps you can take now to avoid paying more in taxes.

news.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in December 2025 on Netflix, Hulu, HBO Max and more
news.summary: ‘Stranger Things’ finally wraps up on Netflix. ‘Fallout’ is back with a new season on Amazon. Taylor Swift takes over Disney+.

news.title: ‘It’s expensive feeding and housing a family of 7’: I’m 41 with $46K in credit-card debt. Do I raid my $1.2 million IRAs?
news.summary: “I bring in $7,200 a month from my pension and disability benefits,” he says. “I’m very lucky. I’ve been through a lot.”

news.title: My friend cosigned a loan for a BMW, but the driver defaulted. They’re both on the hook for $5K. What happens now?
news.summary: “The driver thinks he should be compensated $1,500 for the tires he’s still paying for,” the driver said.

news.title: My college-age kids inherited $300K from a 401(k). What should they do with this money?
news.summary: “This money is likely to be saved for the purchase of homes in 10 years or so,” he says. “It’s a good investment for the future.”

news.title: Fed hawks and doves are battling over December rate cuts — watch these clues to see who wins
news.summary: Stocks and bonds will react to new data on job openings, wages and labor market perceptions. Stocks and bond prices are expected to react to the new data.
